node.title: Original Leadership
node.description: Many feel overwhelmed by the thought of taking on a leadership position, often because of preconceived ideas of the type of skills required to fulfill the role. Yet, through studying scripture and seeking out illustrations in every day life, you will find out that anyone can be a leader because the best leaders are those that lead from who they are--their character. Come for inspiration on how to embrace being the type of leader God has created you to be in the spheres of influence he has placed you.
